title: Summer of CHAOS! | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 70
description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 
 
Chrissy CHAOS is on his solo tip!! Ti TI Jerry is back!!!!! What a great 70 eps of chaos it has been. Ti Ti talks about going to the hospital. Ti Ti doesn't want to take her meds. Chris goes to a Dominican pool party and learns a lot. Latinos are all about love and connection. Ti Ti's sweetheart gets out of prison in 4 months. Should Ti Ti start an Only Fans? IG thots getting paid to go on vacation with gross guys. Science is in charge of society now. Some summer tips from Ti Ti! Chaos patreon flash mob is coming to NYC!!! Jazzy Method actually comes on the pod for the first time!!! Should Chris and Jazz get married? Chris talks about why he doesn't believe in marriage. What do we do with the mental health issue and the homeless? Rolling blackouts are coming all summer YASSSS! Chris talks Joe Rogan aftermath. How was it to be on the Joe Rogan Experience. We answer some patreon questions!!!! What US president would you wanna sleep with?
 
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

 
CHRISDCOMEDY.COM for all upcoming live comedy show dates
FOLLOW Chris Distefano On Social Media
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/chrisdcomedy/​
Twitter - https://twitter.com/chrisdcomedy​
Follow Chris' podcast with Sal Vulcano called HEY BABE!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD8I...​
​
Filmed and Edited by
THEHOMELESSPIMP https://www.instagram.com/thehomeless...
Twitter - https://twitter.com/homelesspimp?lang=en
